title: dVRK system settings
description:
Configuration file format for the dVRK system.  See the [dVRK wiki](https://dvrk.readthedocs.io).

 - This format is used by the application `sawIntuitiveResearchKitSystem` and the ROS application `dvrk_robot dvrk_system`
 - For details of implementation, see code under `sawIntuitiveResearchKit/core/components/code/system.cpp`
 - [Schema file](dvrk-system.schema.json)

items.description: Directory used to locate dVRK configuration files. The directory can be relative. In this case, the search will be relative to the current working directory.

chatty.description: Make the console say something useless when it starts.  It's mostly a way to test the text-to-speech feature.

audio_volume.description: Sets the audio volume (as a ratio of the operating state volume set on the computer)
